segments.text: Ugh, that sink is a disgusting mess, water gushing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying a plate, but her feet are in filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading everywhere— so gross and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not smell the dampness or feel it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is grubby, hands in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbly cookies falling; what a sticky situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles in that wet spot— revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching up, probably getting dirty too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking food like that; it's just unsanitary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets soaked through; mold will set in soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window to the clean garden mocks this slop inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand looking at this sloppy disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
